content: materials caron cuddlesoft * discontinued * 2 ounce 57gram 360 yard skeins rainbow print ombre 8 skeins or 16 oz white 6 skeins or 10 oz size h crochet hook pattern 1-row repeat make 12 strips when you have all the strips complete begin to join strips two joining methods are provided you may make this pattern any length or width you wish simply by adding row and strips for an adult size 17 strips and 100 row becomes a very nice afghan be sure to purchase extra yarn if you intend to enlarge this pattern
